name: removebg-webapp
description: Webapp para remoção automática de fundo de imagens totalmente no navegador usando @imgly/background-removal.

scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && vite build --mode production && npm run build:pwa
scripts.build:pwa: cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r public/icons dist/ && cp -r public/screenshots dist/ && cp public/_redirects dist/
scripts.deploy:test: npm run test && npm run build:prod
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run deploy:test && npx netlify deploy --dir=dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:test && npx netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
